title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.6 - Horses led to the post
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4034.6 - Horses led to the post

State Regulations

When, by permission of the paddock judge and upon
payment to the association of $10, a horse is led to the post, such horse is
excused from parading with the other horses, but nevertheless such horse must, on his way to the post, pass the stewards' stand. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4034.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
